SELECT (SELECT parent.id FROM cargo_mode parent WHERE parent.id = (SELECT cm.parent_id FROM cargo_mode cm WHERE cm.id = dc.cargo_mode_id) ) AS familyId, (SELECT 1) AS level, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT cm.name FROM cargo_mode cm WHERE cm.id = dc.cargo_mode_id) AND sc.locale = :locale) AS cargoModeName, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ut.short_name FROM unit_type ut WHERE ut.id = c.unit_type_id) AND sc.locale = :locale) AS unitTypeName, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=1) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS january, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=2) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS february, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=3) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS march, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=4) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS april, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=5) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS may, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=6) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS june, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=7) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS july, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=8) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS august, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=9) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS september, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=10) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS october, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=11) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS november, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=12) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS december, SUM(CASE WHEN (DATE(dc.created)=DATE(:endDate)) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS currentDate, SUM(IFNULL(c.count, 0)) AS total
FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo dc ON (c.document_cargo_id = dc.id AND c.client_id = dc.client_id AND c.department_id = dc.department_id) JOIN cargo_mode_report cmr ON (cmr.cargo_mode_id = dc.cargo_mode_id AND cmr.report_id = 'MEAT_REPORTS') WHERE dc.created > TIMESTAMP(DATE(:startDate)) AND dc.created <= TIMESTAMP(DATE(:endDate), '23:59:59') AND ( (dc.department_id = :department) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id = :department)) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id IN (SELECT d2.id FROM department d2 WHERE d2.parent_id = :department))) ) GROUP BY dc.cargo_mode_id, c.unit_type_id
UNION
SELECT (SELECT parent.id), (SELECT 0), (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = parent.name AND sc.locale = :locale) AS cargoModeName, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ut.short_name FROM unit_type ut WHERE ut.id = c.unit_type_id) AND sc.locale = :locale) AS unitTypeName, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=1) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS january, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=2) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS february, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=3) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS march, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=4) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS april, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=5) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS may, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=6) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS june, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=7) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS july, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=8) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS august, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=9) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS september, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=10) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS october, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=11) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS november, SUM(CASE WHEN (MONTH(dc.created)=12) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS december, SUM(CASE WHEN (DATE(dc.created)=DATE(:endDate)) THEN IFNULL(c.count, 0) ELSE 0 END) AS currentDate, SUM(IFNULL(c.count, 0)) AS total
FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo dc ON (c.document_cargo_id = dc.id AND c.client_id = dc.client_id AND c.department_id = dc.department_id) JOIN cargo_mode parent ON (parent.id = (SELECT cm.parent_id FROM cargo_mode cm WHERE dc.cargo_mode_id = cm.id)) JOIN cargo_mode_report cmr ON (cmr.cargo_mode_id = dc.cargo_mode_id AND cmr.report_id = 'MEAT_REPORTS') WHERE dc.created > TIMESTAMP(DATE(:startDate)) AND dc.created <= TIMESTAMP(DATE(:endDate), '23:59:59') AND ( (dc.department_id = :department) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id = :department)) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id IN (SELECT d2.id FROM department d2 WHERE d2.parent_id = :department))) ) GROUP BY parent.id, c.unit_type_id
UNION

FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo dc ON (c.document_cargo_id = dc.id AND c.client_id = dc.client_id AND c.department_id = dc.department_id) JOIN cargo_mode_report cmr ON (cmr.cargo_mode_id = dc.cargo_mode_id AND cmr.report_id = 'MEAT_REPORTS') WHERE dc.created> TIMESTAMP(DATE(:startDate)) AND dc.created <= TIMESTAMP(DATE(:endDate), '23:59:59') AND ( (dc.department_id = :department) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id = :department)) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id IN (SELECT d2.id FROM department d2 WHERE d2.parent_id = :department))) ) GROUP BY c.unit_type_id
